title: Podcast special: Can green growth supercharge the north?
description:
Will the green agenda really create new jobs - or will the cost of net zero dampen economic growth? Katy Balls, the Spectator's deputy political editor is at Conservative Party Conference for a live recording with:

Will Gardiner, CEO of Drax
Jake Berry MP, chair of the Northern Research Group
Bim Afolami MP, chair of the Parliamentary Renewable & Sustainable Energy Group Shevaun Haviland, Director General of the British Chambers of Commerce
Ben Houchen, Tees Valley Mayor
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
